title: Syntheses, structural, photophysical and theoretical studies of heteroleptic cycloplatinated guanidinate(1−) complexes bearing acetylacetonate and picolinate ancillary ligands
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13291-13305
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00828F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vasudha Thakur, Jisha Mary Thomas, Mohammad Adnan, Chinnappan Sivasankar, G. Vijaya Prakash, Natesan Thirupathi
[Pt(TAG-κC,κN)(acac)] (TAG = triarylguanidinate(1−) ligands) were isolated and fully characterized. These complexes are bluish green light emitters and the origin of absorption/emission in selected complexes were studied by TD-DFT calculations.
